member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.ExceptionHandling.Logging.LoggingExceptionHandler
member.summary: Represents an that formats the exception into a log message sends it to the Enterprise Library Logging Block.

summary.para: Initialize a new instance of the class.
When overridden by a class, initializes the provider with a .
Handles the specified object by formatting it and writting to the configured log.

param.name: handlingInstanceId
param.para: The unique ID attached to the handling chain for this handling instance.

returns.para: Modified exception to pass to the next handler in the chain.

member.summary: Writes the specified log message using the Logging framework's method.
member.param: The message to write to the log.
